data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Gaston Gerard have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Aurelien Petit, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
At Stade Gaston Gerard, Dijon are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 5, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lorient drive upfield and Yoane Wissa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dijon defender.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
In the minute 8, Dijon needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Dijon.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Roger Assale for Dijon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Aurelien Petit awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Dijon's half.
Adrian Grbic (Lorient) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Lorient.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Dijon.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 21, Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Dijon attack but Bruno Ecuele's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Aurelien Petit signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Lorient's area.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon-Prenois.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Laurent Abergel.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Lorient.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 32, Aurelien Petit signals a Dijon throw-in in Lorient's half.
Lorient's Laurent Abergel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
In the minute 37, Dijon to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Dijon in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 41, Andrew Gravillon (Lorient) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient.
In the minute 42, Sacha Boey (Dijon) has received a first yellow card.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 45, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aurelien Petit blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 46, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's first substitution at Stade Gaston Gerard with Armand Lauriente replacing Julien Laporte.
Throw-in Dijon.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 50, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In Dijon-Prenois, Mama Balde of Dijon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 54, In Dijon-Prenois, Yoane Wissa (Lorient) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Saturnin Allagbe is booked for the home team.
In the minute 57, Lorient have been awarded a penalty in Dijon-Prenois...
Lorient are awarded a penalty at Stade Gaston Gerard. Yoane Wissa takes the kick ... But misses!
Pape Diop is replacing Wesley Lautoa for the home team.
In the minute 59, Dijon make their second substitution with Mounir Chouiar replacing Roger Assale.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Dijon push forward at Stade Gaston Gerard and Mama Balde gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lorient defence.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 66, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Jordan Marie (Dijon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Stephane Jobard (Dijon) is making a third substitution, with Ngonda Muzinga replacing Chafik.
Enzo Le Fee is on a sub for Adrian Grbic for Lorient.
Stephane Diarra is replacing Quentin Boisgard for Lorient at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 70, Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Dijon's half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 72, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Dijon's half.
Lorient are whistled for offside.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Thomas Monconduit with Fabien Lemoine. This is the fourth substitution made today by Christophe Pelissier.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Important block from the Lorient defence as Moussa Konate fires in a strike for Dijon.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 77, Dijon attack but Eric Ebimbe's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 80, Free kick Dijon.
Fabien Lemoine (Lorient) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dijon's Mounir Chouiar breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Dijon-Prenois.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 82, Lorient drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Dijon advance rapidly upfield but Aurelien Petit blows for offside.
In the minute 83, Aurelien Petit awards Lorient a goal kick.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Moussa Konate with Aurelien Scheidler. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stephane Jobard.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Lorient.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 87, Lorient's Yoane Wissa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dijon defender.
Lorient are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 88, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Dijon.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Dijon-Prenois.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient.
Armand Lauriente gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lorient.
Dijon are coming forward and Mama Balde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Lorient have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Dijon-Prenois. The final score is 0-0.
